title.rendered: FXTM Successfully Held an Innovative Seminar in Georgia

content.rendered:
Approved Member of the Financial Commission FXTM successfully held an innovative seminar and workshop for its Iranian traders in Tbilisi. The seminar attracted more than 200 guests and was held by Head of Education Andreas Thalassinos who shared his useful tips and insights to investors of all experience levels under his popular Ultimate Trading Formula series.

The seminar took place on 6 October and taught guests how to develop effective trading strategies and recognize trading opportunities.  There were plenty of opportunities for participants to ask their most pressing industry questions — and our forex guru was happy to answer!

The day ended with an exciting raffle prize draw, where three lucky winners received a cash prize of $1500, $1000 and $500 respectively!

For more information, please visit FXTM’s official website
